  • Uses of SaslAuthenticationProvider in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.provider

    Subinterfaces of SaslAuthenticationProvider in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.provider
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    SaslClientAuthenticationProvider
    Encapsulation of client-side logic to authenticate to HBase via some means over SASL.
    interface 
    SaslServerAuthenticationProvider
    Encapsulates the server-side logic to authenticate a client over SASL.
    Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.provider that implement SaslAuthenticationProvider
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractSaslClientAuthenticationProvider
    Base implementation of SaslClientAuthenticationProvider.
    class 
    BuiltInSaslAuthenticationProvider
    Base class for all Apache HBase, built-in SaslAuthenticationProvider's to extend.
    class 
    DigestSaslAuthenticationProvider
    Base client for client/server implementations for the HBase delegation token auth'n method.
